Picked at place at random wandering the streets of Barcelona - it was the best find of our trip.  The food is excellent, the place is cute, and the staff was very nice.  We had three appetizers and skipped the main course.  All the appetizers were excellent  - a pate salad, foie gras and potato filled with curried chicken.  The last one was our favorite.  We planned to come back to try out the main courses but that will have to wait until our next visit to Barcelona
